food

waste

Globally, one-third of the food produced is wasted. Food waste is a problem in all nations at all stages of economic development, according to a 2021 metaanalysis by the United Nations Environment Programme that excluded food wasted during production. The analysis indicated that 931 million tonnes of food were wasted globally, or 121 kg per person.
